name: OB_HSB_DEL_SIGN
description: This table contains information about the users who signed the information entered in Stork's Delivery Summary activity for this pregnancy.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique ID assigned to the episode record (HSB .1).

columns.name: OBD_SIGNING_EVENT_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the type of signature that was recorded for this user.
